title.narrative: Love Alliance Regional-Subregional

description.narrative: The programme is being implemented in nationally in Zimbabwe and some of the activities are being conducted at regional level
The expenditure was for the regional programme from January to December 2021

title.narrative: L1 Key populations effectively use accountability mechanisms towards SRHR.
Description of the link between Love Alliance indicators with MoFA basket indicators
Key populations effectively use accountability mechanisms towards SRHR.

description.narrative: This indicator aims to measure the degree to which key populations effectively use accountability mechanisms to achieve full sexual and reproductive health and rights.

title.narrative: S1 Diverse KP communities are organised and meaningfully inclusive and have strengthened their capacity to claim their rights and freedoms
Description of the link between Love Alliance indicators with MoFA basket indicators
Number of civil society organisations and community led organisations with increased capacity to advocate for the rights of key populations

description.narrative: This indicator aims to measure the extent to which Love Alliance investments have increased the capacity of civil society organisations and community-led organisations to advocate for the rights of key populations at the national, sub-national, regional or sub-regional level.

comment.narrative: Investments in civil society capacity building have been substantial in Zimbabwe, with external donors/programs including the Global Fund, PEPFAR, PITCH, and others supporting organisational capacity building. The Right Here, Right Now Platform supported by Rutgers has also provided advocacy support
3 organisations which belong to the LGBTIQ sector were capacitated by GALZ during the reporting period

title.narrative: Number of civil society organisations and community led organisations with increased capacity to advocate for the rights of key populations

description.narrative: This indicator aims to measure the extent to which Love Alliance investments have increased the capacity of civil society organisations and community-led organisations to advocate for the rights of key populations at the national, sub-national, regional or sub-regional level.

comment.narrative: Investments in civil society capacity building have been substantial in Zimbabwe, with external donors/programs including the Global Fund, PEPFAR, PITCH, and others supporting organisational capacity building. The Right Here, Right Now Platform supported by Rutgers has also provided advocacy support
The programme is targeting to capacitate 2 women led organisations
TheGALZ managed to develop the capacity of RAWO which is a women lead institution

title.narrative: Number of civil society organisations and community led organisations with increased capacity to advocate for the rights of key populations

description.narrative: This indicator aims to measure the extent to which Love Alliance investments have increased the capacity of civil society organisations and community-led organisations to advocate for the rights of key populations at the national, sub-national, regional or sub-regional level.

comment.narrative: Investments in civil society capacity building have been substantial in Zimbabwe, with external donors/programs including the Global Fund, PEPFAR, PITCH, and others supporting organisational capacity building. The Right Here, Right Now Platform supported by Rutgers has also provided advocacy support.
There were no youth-led organisations strengthened during the period under review

title.narrative: Number of civil society organisations and community led organisations with increased capacity to advocate for the rights of key populations

description.narrative: This indicator aims to measure the extent to which Love Alliance investments have increased the capacity of civil society organisations and community-led organisations to advocate for the rights of key populations at the national, sub-national, regional or sub-regional level.

comment.narrative: Investments in civil society capacity building have been substantial in Zimbabwe, with external donors/programs including the Global Fund, PEPFAR, PITCH, and others supporting organisational capacity building. The Right Here, Right Now Platform supported by Rutgers has also provided advocacy support.

title.narrative: L2.2 Number of Policies formally blocked/retracted (bills, bonds, ballot measures, regulations, administrative policies) related to either civic space and freedoms or (de)criminalisation.
Description of the link between Love Alliance indicators with MoFA basket indicators
Number of Policies formally blocked/retracted (bills, bonds, ballot measures, regulations, administrative policies) related to either civic space and freedoms or (de)criminalisation.

description.narrative: This indicator aims to measure the number of harmful policies related to civic space and freedoms or criminalization, that are formally blocked or retracted with Love Alliance support

title.narrative: Number of Policies formally blocked/retracted (bills, bonds, ballot measures, regulations, administrative policies) related to either civic space and freedoms or (de)criminalisation.

description.narrative: This indicator aims to measure the number of harmful policies related to civic space and freedoms or criminalization, that are formally blocked or retracted with Love Alliance support

title.narrative: L2.1 Number of Policies formally proposed/accepted (bills, bonds, ballot measures, regulations, administrative policies etc.) related to either civic space and freedoms or (de)criminalisation.
Description of the link between Love Alliance indicators with MoFA basket indicators
Number of Policies formally proposed/accepted (bills, bonds, ballot measures, regulations, administrative policies etc.) related to either civic space and freedoms or (de)criminalisation

description.narrative: This indicator aims to measure the number of policies related to improved civic space and freedoms or decriminalisation of key populations, that are formally proposed or accepted with Love Alliance support

title.narrative: L3.1 Number of policies/laws/strategies currently being implemented to meet the needs of key populations as a result of programme contribution.
Description of the link between Love Alliance indicators with MoFA basket indicators
Number of policies/laws/strategies currently being implemented to meet the needs of key populations as a result of programme contribution

description.narrative: This indicator aims to measure the number policies, laws and strategies that are newly being implemented to better meet the needs of key populations as a result of Love Alliance support.
